suppress.notes: okhttp uses certificate pinning which some claim and others dispute can allow a man-in-the-middle attack
Kotlin script is not used in the Sudo Platform Decentralized Identity Relay SDK. Set suppression to expire end of October 2021.
False positive. We're at Kotlin 1.4.32 which is beyond 1.4.21 when fix was available. False positive occurs because the kotlin coroutines libraries are at 1.4.3 and match the broad CPE pattern.
Only trusted HTML/XML is processed using jsoup/dokka in this SDK. This suppression can be removed when dokka updates their jsoup version to 1.14.2.
Guava temporary file creation is not used in the Sudo Decentralized Identity Relay SDK.
vulnerability is in log4j SMTP appender dependency of kotlin-analysis-intellij - this is a gradle plugin.
